name: Coffee Stack
description:
Who doesn't start a day without a cup of coffee?

In this game, you will have a chance to collect, stack, and sell lots of cups of coffee to happy customers.

Upgrade your cups of coffee, try not to give them for free!

You can also design and upgrade your COFFEE SHOP! Decorate your Coffee Shop as in your dreams as you earn money.

What are you waiting for? Open your shop, and invite your first customers in.
